refnamediv.refpurpose: inserts a CR (\015) before each LF (\012)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: addcr reads input from stdin and writes it to stdout. It inserts a CR (\015) before each LF (\012), i.e., at the end of each line of input. It does not insert a CR at the end of a partial final line.

listitem.para: a wrapper for a command that performs CR insertion on its standard I/O

refsection.title: History
refsection.para: addcr was originally part of DanielJ.Bernstein's ucspi-tcp toolset in 1999.

refsection.title: Author
refsection.para: Original code and documentation by DanielJ.Bernstein. Documentation modernizations by Jonathande Boyne Pollard.
